attributes.action: save his job and sort out the economy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister and anyone associated with him. 

I beleieve I can help you. I have a method for helping the economy and would like to share it with you. I want to help you because I beleive myself to be a Labour supporter and would rather you were praised for these measures than those snobs on the oppposite bench from you. I want nothing from this but the satisfaction that I have helped my country and Government I trust in. If you are interested in my help, please send a letter of recognition to jh5393@hotmail.co.uk. If you read this Prime Minister, then believe me when I say that I really want to help you. If at all possible, I would rather remain anonymous.

Yours Sincierly 

A.N.Other

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
